awd_titl_txt: Modernizing the Data Processing Facilities of the Jicamarca Radio Observatory
awd_abstract_narration: This proposal will provide a completely independent new data               taking system from the ADC onward as well as a new radar                        controller, both interfaced to the DEC MIPS computer.  This                     hardware will just be a copy of existing CUPRI/RS hardware, but                 with a new interface for the DEC machine.  The equipment will be                completely checked out at Cornell before taking it to Jicamarca.                The changeover at Jicamarca will consist of simply moving the                   receiver output cables and radar controller cables.  The complete               existing ADC/Controller system at Jicamarca will still be                       available for emergencies and/or to run old programs while new                  software is being written.//
org_div_long_name: Division of Atmospheric and Geospace Sciences
